description: Settings optimized for voice clarity, presence, and reduction of plosives/muddiness.

bands.notes: Slight cut to reduce low-end rumble/noise.
Cut to remove excessive bass or 'boominess' (muddiness).
Small cut to control chest resonance/muddiness.
Small boost to add body and warmth to the voice.
Boost for core intelligibility and clarity.
Slight boost for articulation and presence.
Significant boost for 'air', presence, and articulation (consonants).
Small boost for high-end sparkle and 'air'.
Neutral, or slight roll-off for noise.
